title: why is PBE Sign Up still say "PBE Signups are Closed" even tho its like 4months ago

replies.body: The PBE page has been undergoing maintenance to make it better than before.  I don't have anymore info or updates for now, but the status of the maintenance will be provided through the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Hang tight!
